title: Pune, Teen Driver in Deadly Porsche Crash | Shocking Aftermath Footage #pune #accident
comments:
As much as one can understand the anger of general public, if India aspires to become a nation with the “rule of the law”. People have to stop this mob mentality 

Restrain him from running away and wait for police to show up - record video through out as our police are as corrupt as our public/politicians 

It is the non corrupt and law abiding people who have to set this nation back on the path of justice
